sentences.english: Local herdsmen have all said the mountain as' Tao high- Ula , "meaning Guokui Hill."
sentences.chinese: 当地牧民们都称这座山为‘陶高乌拉”意即锅盔山。

sentences.chinese: 秋千，意即揪着皮绳而迁移。

sentences.english: Mongolian says "Ming dry zhuo pull", meaning thousand lamp that Lantern Festival.
sentences.chinese: 蒙语称“明干卓拉”，意即千盏灯节。

sentences.english: Dart christened the fossil Australopithecus Africanus, meaning the "Southern African ape".
sentences.chinese: 达特给化石命名为非洲南猿，意即“南非类人猿”。

sentences.english: They gave him the title Genghis Khan, which means "emperor of all emperors."
sentences.chinese: 他们赋予他成吉思汗的称号，意即“王中王”。

sentences.english: Question 31. Why is he called Christ, that is anointed?
sentences.chinese: 为何称他为基督，意即受膏者呢？
人类有，Logos意即理法或辩论能力。

sentences.english: This happens because the insulating layer is hydrophobic, meaning it tends to repel water.
sentences.chinese: 出现这种情况，是因为绝缘层厌水，意即它往往排水。

definition: namely/that is/i.e./prompt/at once/at present/even if/prompted (by the occasion)/to approach/to come into contact/to assume (office)/to draw near
